channel.title: ISESteroids on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in ISESteroids on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: ISESteroids RC
item.description: ISESteroids originally started as a simple add-on to add professional editor capabilities to the built-in PowerShell ISE editor. Meanwhile, it evolved to a slick high-end PowerShell script editor.

item.title: PowerShell Risk Assessment with ISESteroids 2.0
item.description: Sharing scripts and downloading sample code becomes common place. But how do you know a script is safe? You would have to read (and understand) it line by line, and carefully check that the script indeed does what it claims to do, before you run it.

item.title: ISESteroids â€“ A Revolutionary PowerShell ISE Add-On
item.description: If you love the built-in ISE editor that ships with PowerShell 3.0 and 4.0, but you were missing some professional editor capabilities, then ISESteroids add them for you.
